H0.text: Where did the first battle of the English Civil War take place. Nottingham

H1.text: Where did the first battle of the English Civil War take place. Hull

H2.text: Where did the first battle of the English Civil War take place. York

H3.text: Where did the first battle of the English Civil War take place. Edghill

A4.text: The Battle of Edgehill was a pitched battle of the First English Civil War.

A5.text: The Battle of Edgehill was fought near Edge Hill and Kineton in southern Warwickshire on Sunday, 23 October 1642.
